bibl.seg: MARTIN Geoffrey Thorndike, with contributions by S.J. CLACKSON †, S.G.J. QUIRKE, J.D. RAY, J. REYNOLDS, J. VAN DER VLIET and G.J. VAN GELDER, Photography by Andrew NORMAN, Stelae from Egypt and Nubia in the Fitzwilliam Museum, Cambridge, c. 3000 BC-AD 1150.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 2005, 4°, xiii-202 pp., fac-sim., nombr. figg. ISBN 0-521-84290-5. £100.
Voir pp. 149-181: Inscriptions grecques (Nos 104-114), coptes et gréco-coptes (Nos 115-122). Les 2 séries comportent quelques stèles inédites.

C.R. par Monica M. Bontty, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2006/2006-04-27.html >. - Sabine Kubisch, OLZ 101 (2006) coll. 607-610 [concerne les inscriptions en égyptien]. - A. von Lieven, AJA 111 (2007), Online Book Reviews < http://www.ajaonline.org/pdfs/book_reviews/111.2/06_VonLieven.pdf >.
